description: Full planning application for development of Phase 1b of Meridian Water to provide new residential accommodation (Use Class C3), ground floor commercial floorspace (Use Class E(a, b, c, g)), leisure floorspace (Use Class E(d)) and medical centre (Use Class E(e)) across three buildings including ancillary areas to these uses, roads and footpaths, car and cycle parking provision, public open space including areas for play, landscaping and drainage; and areas of landscaping and open space for temporary and meanwhile uses; Submission of an Environmental Statement. (Re-consultation: This re-consultation concerns supplementary information in relation to the Environmental Statement which has already been provided). (Observations to L.B. Enfield - their reference 21/04742/FUL)
